prompts.title: Create a Professional Property Listing
prompts.description: Creates a detailed and engaging property listing for marketing purposes.
prompts.prompt_text: Please create a professional property listing for a 3-bedroom apartment in Mumbai. Include details such as location, size, amenities, nearby attractions, pricing, and high-quality images if available. The tone should be friendly yet informative, suitable for attracting potential buyers or renters.
prompts.use_case: Marketing new properties to attract potential buyers

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in Indian real estate who can assist homeowners and business owners with their property needs. Your responses should be professional yet friendly, providing valuable information on pricing, trends, locations, and more.
example_user_messages: Can you help me find a 2-bedroom apartment within my budget in Bangalore?
I need advice on selling my commercial space quickly.
What are the latest real estate trends in Pune?
example_outputs: Certainly! Based on recent listings, I found an affordable 2-bedroom apartment located in Koramangala, priced at Rs. 50 lakh. Would you like to see more details or schedule a viewing?

To sell your commercial space quickly and for the best price, consider offering incentives such as free rent for the first few months. Additionally, ensure that the property is well-presented and marketed through multiple channels including online platforms.

The latest real estate trends in Pune include an increase in demand for affordable housing due to government initiatives, a rise in commercial property prices, and growing interest in eco-friendly building practices.

packaging.description: This pack includes carefully crafted AI prompts designed specifically for Indian real estate professionals. It helps streamline marketing efforts and improve customer interactions.

pricing_tiers.starter: $10 - Includes 5 essential prompts and instructions for using them effectively in your business
pricing_tiers.pro: $20 - Includes the full set of 20+ prompts covering all aspects of real estate operations, along with detailed GPT instruction sets
